meanings.definition: A point at which something ends or terminates.
meanings.sent1: The train station is the endpoint of our journey.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a surprising endpoint that left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: Reaching the endpoint of the maze felt like a major accomplishment.
meanings.sent4: The sunset marked the endpoint of a beautiful day.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led us to the hidden endpoint of our adventure.

meanings.definition: A final point in a process or series.
meanings.sent1: The endpoint of the race was where the winner crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The last chapter of the book revealed the endpoint of the thrilling story.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorating contest had a sweet endpoint with all participants enjoying their creations.
meanings.sent4: The detective finally reached the endpoint of his investigation, solving the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The music concert reached its endpoint with a spectacular fireworks display.
